Preferred Qualifications-Hardware Architecture Knowledge: Familiarity with concepts like memory hierarchy, cache coherence, interconnects, and buses.-SystemC & TLM-2.0: Experience with SystemC modeling and Transaction-Level Modeling is a strong plus.-Exposure to RTL design, simulation, or integration workflows in the semiconductor domain.Employment Application Form https://lnkd.in/gg595AaK hashtag#SkyeChipIsHiring hashtag#SeniorSoftwareEngineer hashtag#SoftwareEngineering hashtag#EDAtools hashtag#CareerOpportunity
